Uses of Package
com.esri.mo2.cs.geom

Packages that use com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
com.esri.mo2.cs.geom Fundamental classes used for geometry calculations. 
com.esri.mo2.cs.proj Contains implementations for all projections in Map Objects Java. 
com.esri.mo2.svr.map Provides components for developing server-side applications that could be run within any J2EE server or as a standalone application. 
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.cs.geom used by com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
BaseFeatureGeometry
          This class is the base implementation for FeatureGeometry.
BaseGeometry
          This class is the base implementation of Geometry.
BaseGeometryIterator
          A common utility used by the various PathIterator classes.
BasePath
          Standard implementation of Path.
BasePointsArray
          A standard Points implementation that stores one or more points within a pair of coordinate arrays - one array for X ordinates and the other for Y ordinates.
BasePointsArrayIterator
          Provides iterator support for BasePointArrays.
BasePolylineIterator
          The PathIterator for Polylines.
BaseTransform
          This is the standard implementation of the Transform interface.
ClementiniGeometry
          The methods in this interface implement the CBM (calculus-based methods) of Clementini et als.
Curve
          This interface implements an abstract class that represents simple linear objects, such as, arcs, segments, paths, and rings.
DisplayTransform
          This interface implements a transform from a Euclidean coordinate system (Y values increase upwards) to a Windows coordinate system (Y values increase downwards).
FeatureGeometry
          This interface implements a Geometry that can be stored externally.
FeaturePoint
          This class implements a Point inside a feature.
Geometry
          This is the public interface for 2D ESRI geometry objects.
GeometryCollection
          This interface implements a homogenous collection of similar Geometries.
GeometryException
          A generic Exception thrown by com.esri.mo2.cs.geom package methods.
HitTest
          This interface implements a method to allow selection of a vertex within a MultiPoint, Polygon, or Polyline feature.
InvalidValuesException
          Thrown by com.esri.mo2.cs.geom.Global.parseEnvelope(), if the number of tokens in the given string is not equal to 4.
MBasePointsArray
          A standard implementation of Points, that stores Point(s) within a pair of coordinate arrays, and a measured value array.
MBasePointsArrayIterator
          This class provides iterator support for MBasePointArrays.
MPointCollection
          Adds Measures support to the point collection interface.
MultiPoint
          Implements a collection of Points.
MZPointCollection
          This interface adds support of M and Z to the point collection interface.
Path
          Implements a Path that consists of one or more points that represent a collection of straight-line segments.
Point
          This class represents the Point type.
PointApplicatorUser
          Allows you to apply mass changes to the points in a feature geometry by using a PointApplicator.
PointCollection
          A prototypical collection of Points that exist in all Geometry classes and interfaces.
PointIterator
          Provides fast iterator support for point collections.
PointM
          This class represents a 2D Point with an additional measure value.
Polygon
          Implements a collection of one or more Rings.
Polyline
          Implements a collection of one or more paths.
Ring
          Implements a closed Path that forms a simple area object.
Segment
          Implements a Segment that defines a linear shape connecting two points.
SegmentCollection
          Implements a collection of straight-line Segments.
SegmentHitTest
          Defines a method to allow selection of a segment within a Polygon or Polyline.
Transform
          A transformation similar to java.awt.geom.AffineTransform, but is restricted to a common scale for both X and Y directions.
Vector2D
          This class implements a vector with a X component and Y component.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.cs.geom used by com.esri.mo2.cs.proj
ClementiniGeometry
          The methods in this interface implement the CBM (calculus-based methods) of Clementini et als.
Envelope
          This class implements a 2D rectangular shape in world coordinates, used frequently for bitmap and selection purposes.
FeatureGeometry
          This interface implements a Geometry that can be stored externally.
Geometry
          This is the public interface for 2D ESRI geometry objects.
GeometryCollection
          This interface implements a homogenous collection of similar Geometries.
HitTest
          This interface implements a method to allow selection of a vertex within a MultiPoint, Polygon, or Polyline feature.
PointApplicatorUser
          Allows you to apply mass changes to the points in a feature geometry by using a PointApplicator.
Polygon
          Implements a collection of one or more Rings.
SegmentHitTest
          Defines a method to allow selection of a segment within a Polygon or Polyline.
